step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Excellent work inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles! Keep visualizing fluid moving to your chest as you continue.
Fantastic job exhaling slowly through your mouth and relaxing your muscles! Keep visualizing pushing fluid out with each exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
